name: volroon
description: Roon Bridge plugin for Volumio 3 that features track info/album art and control of Roon from Volumio.

volumio_info.details: THIS LATEST VERSION REQUIRES YOU TO REAUTHORIZE IN ROON!!! Roon Bridge plugin for Volumio 3 that features track info/album art and control of Roon from Volumio.
